gettingStarted.title: Quick Start Guide
gettingStarted.description: Follow these steps to set up your digital restaurant menu

step1.title: Create Menu Categories
step1.description: Start by adding categories like "Grills" and "Appetizers"

step2.title: Add Items
step2.description: Add dishes with prices, images, and descriptions

step3.title: Customize Design
step3.description: Upload the restaurant logo and choose the appropriate colors

step4.title: Print QR Code
step4.description: Get the QR code and place it on the restaurant tables

logo.title: Restaurant Logo
logo.description: Upload your restaurant's logo to be displayed on the digital menu (200x200px recommended)

color.title: Primary Color
color.description: Choose the primary color for your restaurant

logoPosition.title: Logo Position
logoPosition.description: Choose where the logo appears on the menu header.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Links
socialMedia.description: Add links to your social media pages.

contrastWarning.title: Low Contrast
contrastWarning.description: This color has low contrast with white text, which might make it hard to read.

qr.title: Digital Menu QR Code
qr.description: Generate and download the QR code for the restaurant

card.title: QR Code
card.description: Scan this code to access the menu for {{restaurantName}}

menuUrl.title: Menu URL
menuUrl.description: Customers can also access the menu directly via this link

step1.title: Print the Code
step1.description: Save or print the QR code in a suitable size (at least 5x5 cm is recommended)

step2.title: Place the Code
step2.description: Place the code on restaurant tables or near the entrance

step3.title: Scan and Order
step3.description: Customers scan the code with their phone camera and order via WhatsApp

tips.title: Important Tips
tips.tip1: Make sure the code is clear when printing
tips.tip2: Place the code where customers can easily access it
tips.tip3: Save a digital copy of the code for future use
tips.tip4: You can create different sizes for different uses
